content.rendered:
2021 Euro Semi-Finals and Final Packages

The excitement of the 2021 Euro will culminate at London’s iconic Wembley Stadium. Playing host to both Semi-Finals and the Championship Final, London will be the place to be next July. The entire tournament has seen all 24 teams working toward earning a spot in these matches and the atmosphere will be absolutely electric.

Secure your spot in history with a custom package to both Semi-Finals and the epic Final. Your experience includes seven nights’ first class accommodations in London, tickets to both semis and the final match, a full English breakfast daily, our famous pre travel concierge services to fully complete your ultimate football week and the friendly and helpful assistance of our on-site host team while abroad.

Complete 7-night 2021 UEFA Euro Semi-Final and Final packages available from $14,935 per person (based on double occupancy).
